## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RAD7b</u>
- **Gene Name:** Radiation sensitive 7b
- **Description:**   F-box/RNI-like superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:505006471
